de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl
Class Axon

java.lang.Object
  de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl.Axon

public class Axon
extends java.lang.Object

Axon Representation for a Neuronal Network. Training is implemented inside of this class.

Author:
Tobias Knoth
